title: Fecode –æ–±—ä—è–≤–∏–ª –æ –≤–∑—è—Ç–∏–∏ –ë–æ–≥–æ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω–∏–∫, 17 –∏—é–Ω—è: —ç—Ç–æ –±—É–¥—É—Ç –º–µ—Å—Ç–∞ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∏
title_en: Fecode announced the capture of Bogota on Monday, June 17th: These will be the meeting places
summary_en:
The Colombian Federation of Education Workers confirmed the locations of the rally on June 17.
The rally is called the "Great Capture of Bogota" because of the discussion of the draft they want to withdraw at the Senate plenary session.
Fecode announced the capture of Bogota on Monday, June 17th, for a meeting.
The Ministry of Education continues to protest against the education bill being considered in Congress.
Air-e is charging prices for investments it did not make, prompting an investigation by the Public Utilities Administration.
A group of male weavers became popular after demonstrating their talent in the Medellin metro.
Under the slogan "Knitting is a matter for people", the team of seamstresses at the Medellin house and metro intends to abandon masculinity.
Some suggest that the "retirement" of a patrolman reported missing is a response to the process of finding peace of mind.
